column4: - I have Debian installed on my latitude fine - although it is rather old now. You need to try and find the actual chipset that the wireless card in your laptop uses then search and see if you can find a driver to run it.
- I use a plug in card (PCMCIA) - Belkin G+ MIMO
thanks for the advice.  i've got a wireless card I can use here, but I'd like to use the integrated one if I can
